definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: The owners of these experiences recognize them as fragmentary semimemories.
sentences.chinese: 这些过往经历的主人把它们当作是零碎的半记忆片段。

sentences.english: When they met in the church tower the gaps in their fragmentary conversation were filled up.
sentences.chinese: 到了教堂的钟楼，他们零碎谈话的空隙才算给填满。

sentences.english: And the rest, some on boards, some on broken pieces of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 其余的人，可以用板子，或船上的零碎东西上岸。

sentences.english: Quite how this differs from the piecemeal reform that the IASB has always opposed is unclear.
sentences.chinese: 这同其长久反对的零碎改革的区别还很不清楚。

sentences.english: What time pockets do you have in your life?
sentences.chinese: 你的生活里有多少零碎时间？

sentences.english: In the past few days were not free, are busy in a number of things piecemeal .
sentences.chinese: 这几天都没得闲，都是在忙一些零碎的事。

sentences.english: Time has traveled into fragmentary memories of the dawn and then melt into one wipe mist.
sentences.chinese: 光阴把回想辗转成零碎，化做晨曦中的一抹雾霭。

sentences.english: He distills a little urine after he has accomplished urinating.
sentences.chinese: 他小便后，还会有少量零碎地滴下。

sentences.english: And the rest, some on boards, and some on broken pieces of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 其馀的人，可以用板子，或船上的零碎东西上岸。

sentences.english: The few surviving scraps of notes are crammed with story tentatives .
sentences.chinese: 所留存的一些零碎笔记满是故事的试作。

sentences.english: The cost for me was nothing, as I had all the little bits on hand.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言根本没花费什么，因为这些小零碎我都有呢。

sentences.english: We have emptied the bus of all our detritus.
sentences.chinese: 我们把所有零碎东西从巴士上清理下来。

sentences.english: The beaches are wide and filled with interesting flotsam and jetsam.
sentences.chinese: 海滩宽阔，到处是有趣的被冲上岸的零碎什物。

sentences.english: Mother pieced together odds and ends of cloth and made a tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈把零碎布头拼成一幅桌布。

sentences.english: Sealable bags secure food and reduce bulk and garbage.
sentences.chinese: 密封袋能保护食物并减少零碎和垃圾。

sentences.english: Next month they're installing new alarms in a bank in Marylebone.
sentences.chinese: 他们如今正在给一家银行重新装置警报零碎。

definition: an assortment/a bit of everything/lots of different (skills)
to gather/to rake together/to pile up
disordered and in a mess (idiom); all mixed up and chaotic
